author: ruchithf
msg: - One more WS-Sec Conv scenario working - Now rahas module will automatically create the security context if an STS is not specified and will propagate SCT to the other party in a RSTR sent in the soap:Header.
- Added a test case to do the above
- Modified the sec.jks to include the STS's cert as a trusted certificate
